title: Why is Sivir so popular now.
body: Last season no one played her but this season i rarely see a high elo game without her in it. What did i miss ? why has she shot back up?{{champion:15}}

replies.body:
Because Riot nerfed all of her counters. Soon, no doubt, they'll nerf her again and the cycle will repeat over and over.

This is the sh*t that happens when a MMO company's method of champion balance closely resembles Whack-a-Mole.
I used to play sivir mid vs ahri.
She is good. Her ult allows her to reposition her entire team for a teamfight, for one thing.
Because new cheap awesome looking sivir skin coming out

People realised that free Banshee ain't too bad in a champ's kit.

Probably had a buff somewhere too.
